page.title: 12CHILDREN'S GAMES II
page.content: Fish in the Net _ one person is "on it" and that person is the net and the rest of the players are the fish. The fish have to run from one end of the room to the other without being caught. If they are caught they join hands with the net and help it. The net has to keep its hands joined;if it breaks hands all the fish who are in the net become free and you start the game again. Baked Beans _ one person is the caller and the rest of the players walk round in a circle. The caller calls out the name of a bean like "broad bean". Then the players have to make themselves fat. "French bean" means they have to act posh. At the call "baked beans",everybody runs. Those who are caught by the caller are out.
